list.en: Sit down, please.
list.cn: 请坐。

list.en: How long can I keep it?
list.cn: 我可以借多久?

list.en: My English is progressing in leaps and bounds.
list.cn: 我的英语突飞猛进。

list.en: After registering, I began to prepare to settle baggage.
list.cn: 登记后，我开始准备托运行李。

list.en: You only review your lessons in one month.
list.cn: 你只在一个月内复习功课。

list.en: Any questions?
list.cn: 有什么问题吗?

list.en: Do you like reading English novels?
list.cn: 你喜欢读英语小说吗?

list.en: I'm anxious about my exam results.
list.cn: 我很担心我的考试成绩。

list.en: Would you like to join us for Mary's birthday party tonight?
list.cn: 今晚你愿意和我们一起参加玛丽的生日聚会吗?

list.en: I won high rating in my exams.
list.cn: 我在考试中得了高分。

list.en: You can renew the book if you can't finish reading.
list.cn: 如果你看不完，你可以续借这本书。

list.en: Only you study hard. Can you get good results?
list.cn: 只有你努力学习。你能取得好成绩吗?

list.en: I'm going to bring a bottle of wine to your birthday party.
list.cn: 我要带一瓶酒去参加你的生日聚会。

list.en: I got 99 points on the English test.
list.cn: 我英语考试得了99分。

list.en: Do you take notes during English course?
list.cn: 你在英语课上做笔记吗?

list.en: Why are you late?
list.cn: 你为什么迟到了?

list.en: The more nearer the examination is, the more nervous I feel.
list.cn: 离考试越近，我就越紧张。

list.en: Let's find a part time job and get some work experience.
list.cn: 我们找一份兼职工作，积累一些工作经验吧。

list.en: When does the birthday party begin?
list.cn: 生日聚会什么时候开始?

list.en: I'd like to invite you to my birthday party.
list.cn: 我想邀请你参加我的生日聚会。

list.en: Do you often go to the English corner?
list.cn: 你经常去英语角吗?

list.en: It's time for class.
list.cn: 该上课了。

list.en: She failed his French paper because it was too difficult.
list.cn: 她的法语考试不及格，因为太难了。

list.en: Who can read it aloud first?
list.cn: 谁能第一个大声朗读?

list.en: Sorry, because I had something to do and was late for class.
list.cn: 对不起，因为我有事情要做，上课迟到了。

list.en: You should find a part time job to earn money to support yourself.
list.cn: 你应该找一份兼职工作挣钱养活自己。

list.en: I feel very nervous before the exams.
list.cn: 临考前我感到很紧张。

list.en: I have been studying English for more than ten years.
list.cn: 我学英语已经有十多年了。

list.en: I'm busy preparing for the final exam.
list.cn: 我正忙着准备期末考试。

list.en: I've never been late for school.
list.cn: 我上学从来没有迟到过。

list.en: Please return your books in thirty days.
list.cn: 请在三十天内还书。

list.en: I tried to watch English movies without subtitles.
list.cn: 我试着看没有字幕的英语电影。

list.en: Would you please tell us how to review lessons?
list.cn: 你能告诉我们怎样复习功课吗?

list.en: Speak loudly, please.
list.cn: 请大声说。

list.en: Let's take turns to read.
list.cn: 让我们轮流读。

list.en: I reviewed the list every month.
list.cn: 我每个月都看一遍清单。

list.en: I scored high Marks in my examinations.
list.cn: 我在考试中得了高分。

list.en: I'd like to renew the book for another week.
list.cn: 我想把这本书再续借一个星期。

list.en: You'll have to pay the fine before you check those books.
list.cn: 在你借阅这些书之前，你必须先交罚款。

list.en: He failed in arithmetic.
list.cn: 他算术不及格。

list.en: To find a part time job, we can be a little more independent from our parents as a result.
list.cn: 找一份兼职工作，我们可以更独立一点，从我们的父母的结果。

list.en: I'm sorry I'm late.
list.cn: 对不起，我迟到了。

list.en: If you don't hurry, we'll be late.
list.cn: 如果你不快点，我们就要迟到了。

list.en: We can also find a lot of information for part time jobs on our university's online message board.
list.cn: 我们也可以在我们大学的在线留言板上找到很多兼职工作的信息。

list.en: How do you learn English?
list.cn: 你是怎么学英语的?

list.en: How is your day arrangement for the review?
list.cn: 你今天的复习安排得怎么样了?

list.en: When will the freshman registration begin?
list.cn: 新生什么时候开始注册?

list.en: Mom, may I have a birthday party?
list.cn: 妈妈，我可以开一个生日聚会吗?

list.en: He got better grades than I did.
list.cn: 他的成绩比我好。

list.en: Her birthday party was very crowded.
list.cn: 她的生日聚会非常拥挤。

list.en: Let's read the text aloud together.
list.cn: 让我们一起大声朗读课文。

list.en: What if I'm not finished with it by the due date?
list.cn: 如果我在截止日期前没有完成该怎么办?

list.en: Enjoy yourselves.
list.cn: 享受自己。

list.en: I'm going to have a little birthday party tomorrow. Would you like to come?
list.cn: 明天我要举行一个小型生日聚会。你愿意来吗?

list.en: How about your academic records at college?
list.cn: 你在大学的学习成绩如何?

list.en: I stayed up all night for reviewing for the exam.
list.cn: 为了复习考试，我熬了一整夜。

list.en: He wagers on the results of this examination.
list.cn: 他赌这次考试的结果。

list.en: I swear I will never be late again.
list.cn: 我发誓我再也不会迟到了。

list.en: You did quite well.
list.cn: 你做得很好。
